import{createSlice,createAsyncThunk}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import axios from'axios';// Async thunks
export const fetchAdminData=createAsyncThunk('admin/fetchAdminData',async()=>{const response=await axios.get('/api/admin/dashboard');return response.data;});export const fetchUserDetails=createAsyncThunk('admin/fetchUserDetails',async()=>{const response=await axios.get('/api/admin/users');return response.data;});// Initial state
const initialState={user:null,token:null,dashboardData:null,users:[],loading:false,error:null};// Slice
const adminSlice=createSlice({name:'admin',initialState,reducers:{setAdminCredentials:(state,action)=>{state.user=action.payload.user;state.token=action.payload.token;},logoutAdmin:state=>{state.user=null;state.token=null;}},extraReducers:builder=>{builder.addCase(fetchAdminData.pending,state=>{state.loading=true;state.error=null;}).addCase(fetchAdminData.fulfilled,(state,action)=>{state.loading=false;state.dashboardData=action.payload;}).addCase(fetchAdminData.rejected,(state,action)=>{state.loading=false;state.error=action.error.message;}).addCase(fetchUserDetails.fulfilled,(state,action)=>{state.users=action.payload;});}});// Export actions and reducer
export const{setAdminCredentials,logoutAdmin}=adminSlice.actions;export default adminSlice.reducer;
